title: No offense to Yasuo players but.....
body:
How the hell is he 10 Difficulty? He's not that overly hard...I would put him at around 7 to 8 Difficulty, definitely not 10...


{{champion:157}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:157}}

replies.body: The same reason that riven players think they are gods gift to the league.

Probably because everyone below Diamond 1 sucks at Yasuo but to be honest you shouldn't listen to those, they are very inaccurate, Riot aren't very good at the specifics, for example look at recommended builds they are garbage, Rengar doesn't have a Last Whisper in his recommended build and that is a core item on him, instead he has this %%%%ty item called Blade of the Ruined King.
And on Howling Abyss FROSTFANG IS RECOMMENDED FOR KATARINA.

I guess you need to have good reflexes for Wind Walling but once you know the skill shots of enemies you kind of get used to it..
I guess you need to be able to hit a low ranged auto attack and the third one is longer with a slower travel time but it's not that hard...
I guess you need to know how to utilise the set-range spammable dash but that's really easy to get used to...
I guess you need to have good coordination with combing but doesn't that get obvious? You have someone on your team with a knock up and you automatically spam your R on targets waiting for the knockup which is nearly guaranteed to come...

He's a Difficulty of 7 to 8 to the max, not 10........
Maybe because his ulty is a little hard to land since they have to be knocked up to ult them.

Because rito thinks it's hard to Q a minion twice then aim a skill shot, and mash R.

Then any champ with a knockup comes in and proves this champ isn't anywhere near a 7, and rito doesn't watch.
Yasuo does require skill try knocking them up with q then e and ult on them the timing has to be perfect also his e knockup q combo and he doesn't have much of a disengage if no minions are around

Because the difficulty meter now MOSTLY means how spamming a champ is (or sometimes how 1 dimensional a champ is, which I can see where it's coming from), and apparently you need more skill to learn to spam while you need less skill in rational thinking and strategic planning because your skillset is limiting in many ways.

GJ Riot, you just went nearly full t**a**rd.
